title: (x) Galloway cheese 'Slices and Grated' script - custom {Andrew Pendleton}
content:
Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Galloway Slice & Grated.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070519135216/http:/typophile.com/files/Galloway%20Slice%20&%20Grated.jpg) | 167.95 KB |
author: R27

comments.content:
This has to be custom. Compare the ‘e’ glyphs in “Slices” and “Grated.” May be based on something, but almost definitely hand-lettered.

Andrew
For something reasonably close, you could check out [Amorinda](http://web.archive.org/web/20070519135216/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000021)….
